patterns: Can I collect my order at the shop?

patterns: Can I get delivery for my order?

patterns: When is SKS Sweets and Cakes open?
responses: SKS Sweets and Cakes is usually open from morning till late evening. For today's exact timings, please contact the store directly.
We are open all days in general, with extended hours during festivals. You can call the shop for today's schedule.
Our shop runs throughout the day with a short break in the afternoon. For precise timings, please check with the store.

patterns: How do I reach SKS Sweets and Cakes?
responses: You can find SKS Sweets and Cakes by searching our name on Google Maps. It will show the exact route and address.

For location and directions to SKS Sweets and Cakes, please check Google Maps or contact the store directly.

patterns: What flavours of cake do you have?
responses: We offer fresh cream cakes, chocolate cakes, butterscotch, black forest, white forest, fruit cakes, and more at SKS Sweets and Cakes.
Our cake range includes regular, premium, and designer cakes. You can choose from chocolate, vanilla, butterscotch, red velvet, and more.
We have birthday cakes, anniversary cakes, kids' theme cakes, and special occasion cakes. Let me know what type you’re looking for.

patterns: Can I get an eggless cake?

responses: Yes, we do offer eggless cakes at SKS Sweets and Cakes. Please mention 'eggless' while placing your order.

patterns: Do you take custom cake orders?

responses: Yes, we accept custom cake orders including photo cakes and theme cakes. Please share the design, flavour, size, and date.

Custom cakes are made on pre-order. Kindly provide the design reference and required delivery or pickup date in advance.

responses: Please  check website to get the latest price list.

patterns: How do I place an order?

responses: You can place an order by visiting SKS Sweets and Cakes directly, or by calling the shop to confirm your items and pickup time.
For advance orders, please contact the store, share your items, quantity, date, and time, and confirm availability.
Order process is simple: choose items, confirm quantity and date with the shop, and then pay during pickup or as instructed by the store.

patterns: I want to modify my order

patterns: How long do your sweets stay fresh?
Do I need to refrigerate the sweets?
How long can I keep the cake?
responses: Most milk-based sweets and cream cakes are best consumed within 1–2 days and should be refrigerated. Dry sweets usually last longer.
For best taste and quality, we recommend consuming fresh sweets and cakes on the same day or as advised on purchase.
Storage and shelf life vary by item. The shop staff will guide you at the time of purchase based on what you’ve bought.

patterns: Is there any combo offer on sweets?

Discounts depend on ongoing promotions and quantity. For exact details, its best to speak with the shop team.

patterns: Do you have Diwali special sweets?

Gift packs, assorted sweet boxes, and special items are usually available for festivals. You can pre-book for large quantities.
